wynnlib.tooltip.position_modifier.left: (To ingredients to the left of this one)
wynnlib.tooltip.position_modifier.right: (To ingredients to the right of this one)
wynnlib.tooltip.archetype.title: %s Archetype
wynnlib.archetype.desc.fallen: Fallens can deal massive damage and become stronger when attacked. The main gimmick of this archetype is the Corrupted system. While Corrupted, you cannot heal but each % of health you lose makes you stronger and let you use powered-up abilities.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.battle_monk: Battle Monks are swift holy warriors who excel at close combat. They are the most mobile of the Warrior archetypes and can deal a ton of hits rapidly. In a way, they are somewhat of a hybrid of a warrior and assassin.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.paladin: Paladin can endure huge hits and support allies. They are unmoveable brick walls and incredibly resilient, by far the toughest archetype out of all classes.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.boltslinger: Boltslingers deal massive amounts of hits, and excel at close range. They are all about arrow spam and getting in enemies' faces to unleash a torrent of damage. Quite risky at times.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.sharpshooter: Sharpshooters excel at aiming and can deal brutal hits. They deal damage at incredible distances and become stronger when they don't miss, building up Focus for additional damage.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.trapper: Trappers can place exploding traps and use beasts. They specialize in controlling large areas and creating mayhem from a safe distance.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.riftwalker: Riftwalkers bend time and become stronger as fights drag on. While very mobile, their main gimmick is the Winded status effect. As you fight, enemies will receive more and more Winded which will increase your damage to insane levels.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.light_bender: Light Benders support allies and become stronger as they heal. Even with a lack of friends, you can summon your own Orbs which can be healed and let you scale your damage on your own. Very independent!
wynnlib.archetype.desc.arcanist: Arcanists cause destructive damage and chaos. They can save up mana and unleash it in a torrent of high damaging abilities. With enough skill, you can end up in an endless loop of spell spam that both enemies and yourself will struggle to control.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.shadestepper: Shadesteppers hide themselves and deal devastating damage at the right time. They are all about stacking huge damage boosts and one-shotting enemies with surprise strikes.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.trickster: Tricksters summon clones and confuse enemies with various tricks. They excel at crowd control and managing large groups of enemies.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.acrobat: Acrobats are agile and combo-heavy fighters. They generally spend more time in the air than on the ground.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.summoner: Summoners use totems and summons to overwhelm enemies. They can stay at a safe distance and buff their minions to deal great damage.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.ritualist: Ritualists create miracles through hymns and dances. Their main gimmick is the Mask system, where they can switch between 3 different states on the fly for different buffs and abilities.
wynnlib.archetype.desc.acolyte: Acolytes sacrifice their own health to support others and deal damage. Build up your Blood Pool and use it to enhance your abilities.
wynnlib.ability.desc.bash: Violently bash the ground, dealing high damage in a large area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.spear_proficiency_i: Improve your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.main_attack}}'s damage and range when using a spear.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_bash_i: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.bash}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.double_bash: n{@{.bash}} will hit a second time at a farther range.
wynnlib.ability.desc.charge: Charge forward at high speed. //8{(Hold shift while charging to cancel)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.tougher_skin: Harden your skin and become permanently f{+${resistant_bonus}%} more resistant. ////For every f{1%} or f{1 Raw} Health Regen you have from items, gain f{+10} Health. (Max 100)
wynnlib.ability.desc.vehement: For every f{1%} or f{1 Raw Main} Attack Damage you have from items, gain f{+2%} Walk Speed. (Max 20%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.uppercut: Rocket enemies in the air and deal massive damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_charge: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.charge}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.war_scream: Emit a terrorizing roar that deals damage, pull nearby enemies, and add damage resistance to yourself and allies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.heavy_impact: After using n{@{.charge}}, violently crash down unto the ground and deal damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_earth_maste: Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_thunder_mas: Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_air_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Air attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_fire_master: Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.warrior_water_maste: Increase your damage from all Water attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.quadruple_bash: n{@{.bash}} will hit f{4} times at an even farther range.
wynnlib.ability.desc.fireworks: Mobs hit by n{@{.uppercut}} will explode mid-air and receive additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.flyby_jab: Damage enemies in your way when using n{@{.charge}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.flaming_uppercut: n{@{.uppercut}} will light mobs on fire, dealing damage every f{0.6} seconds.
wynnlib.ability.desc.half_moon_swipe: n{@{.uppercut}} will deal a footsweep attack at a longer and wider angle. All elemental conversions become b{❉} Water.
wynnlib.ability.desc.generalist: After casting f{3} different spells in a row, your next spell will cost f{5} Mana.
wynnlib.ability.desc.counter: When dodging a nearby enemy attack, get f{30%} chance to instantly attack back.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mantle_of_the_bovem: When casting n{@{.war_scream}}, create a holy shield around you that reduces all incoming damage by f{70%} for f{3} hits. (20s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.bakals_grasp: After casting n{@{.war_scream}}, become b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}. (15s Cooldown)//You cannot heal while in that state.////While b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, every f{2%} of Health you lose will add f{+4} Raw Damage to your attacks. (Max 120)
wynnlib.ability.desc.spear_proficiency_i: Improve your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.main_attack}}'s damage and range when using a spear.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_uppercut_i: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.uppercut}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.aerodynamics: During n{@{.charge}}, you can steer and change direction.
wynnlib.ability.desc.provoke: Mobs damaged by n{@{.war_scream}} will target only you for at least f{5s}.////Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.war_scream}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.air_shout: n{@{.war_scream}} will fire a projectile that can go through walls and deal damage multiple times.
wynnlib.ability.desc.enraged_blow: While b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, every f{1%} of Health you lose will increase your damage by f{+3%}. (Max 300%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.flying_kick: When using n{@{.charge}}, enemies hit will halt your momentum, and get knockbacked.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_mantle: Add f{+2} additional charges to n{@{.mantle_of_the_bovemists}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.manachism: If you receive a hit that's less than f{5%} of your max HP, gain f{10} Mana. (1s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.boiling_blood: n{@{.bash}} leave a trail of boiling blood behind its first explosion, slowing down and damaging enemies above it every f{0.4} seconds.
wynnlib.ability.desc.ragnarokkr: n{@{.war_scream}} become deafening, increasing its range and giving damage bonus to players.
wynnlib.ability.desc.ambidextrous: Increase your chance to attack with n{@{.counter}} by f{+30%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.burning_heart: For every f{100} Health Bonus you have from item IDs, gain f{+2%} Fire Damage. (Max 100%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.intoxicating_blood: After leaving b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, gain f{2%} of the health lost back for each enemy killed while b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.collide: Enemies thrown into walls from n{@{.flying_kick}} will explode and receive additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.rejuvenating_skin: Regain back f{30%} of the damage you take as healing over f{30s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.comet: After being hit by n{@{.fireworks}}, enemies will crash unto the ground and receive more damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.uncontainable_corru: Reduce the cooldown of n{@{.bakals_grasp}} by f{5s}, and increase the raw damage gained for every f{2%} of health lost by f{+1}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.radiant_devotee: For every f{4%} Reflection you have from items, gain f{+1/5s} Mana Regen. (Max 10/5s)
wynnlib.ability.desc.whirlwind_strike: n{@{.uppercut}} will create a strong gust of air, launching you upward with enemies.//8{(Hold shift to stay grounded)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.mythril_skin: Gain f{+5%} Base Resistance and become immune to knockback.
wynnlib.ability.desc.armour_breaker: While b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, losing f{30%} Health will make your next n{@{.uppercut}} destroy enemies' defences, rendering them weaker to damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shield_strike: When your n{@{.mantle_of_the_bovemists}} loses all charges, deal damage around you for each Mantle individually lost.
wynnlib.ability.desc.sparkling_hope: Everytime you get healed f{5%} of your max health, deal damage to all nearby enemies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.massive_bash: While b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, every f{3%} Health you lose will add f{+1} Area of Effect to n{@{.bash}}. (Max 10)
wynnlib.ability.desc.tempest: n{@{.war_scream}} will ripple the ground and deal damage f{3} times in a large area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.spirit_of_the_rabbi: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.charge}} and increase your Walk Speed by f{+20%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.massacre: While b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}}, if your effective attack speed is f{Slow} or lower, hitting an enemy with your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.main_attack}} will add f{+1%} to your b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.warrior_corrupted}} bar.
wynnlib.ability.desc.axe_kick: Increase the damage of n{@{.uppercut}}, but also increase its mana cost.
wynnlib.ability.desc.radiance: n{@{.bash}} will buff your allies' positive IDs. (15s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_bash_ii: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.bash}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_war_scream: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.war_scream}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.discombobulate: Every time you hit an enemy, briefly increase your elemental damage dealt to them by f{+2} (Additive, Max +50).//This bonus decays f{5} every second.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cyclone: After casting n{@{.war_scream}}, envelop yourself with a vortex that damages nearby enemies every f{0.5s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.thunderclap: n{@{.bash}} will cast at the player's position and gain additional area of effect. All elemental conversions become e{✦} Thunder.
wynnlib.ability.desc.second_chance: When you receive a fatal blow, survive and regain f{30%} of your Health. (10m Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.blood_pact: If you do not have enough mana to cast a spell, spend health instead. (f{0.6%} health per mana)
wynnlib.ability.desc.haemorrhage: Reduce n{@{.blood_pact}}'s health cost. (f{0.3%} health per mana)
wynnlib.ability.desc.brink_of_madness: If your health is f{25%} full or less, gain f{+40%} Resistance.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_uppercut_ii: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.uppercut}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.martyr: When you receive a fatal blow, all nearby allies become invincible.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_bomb: Throw a long-ranged arrow that explodes and deal high damage in a large area.//8{(self-damage for 25% of your DPS)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.bow_proficiency_i: Improve your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.main_attack}}'s damage and range when using a bow.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_bomb_: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.arrow_bomb}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.heart_shatter: If you hit a mob directly with n{@{.arrow_bomb}}, shatter its heart and deal bonus damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.escape: Throw yourself backward to avoid danger.//8{(Hold shift while escaping to cancel)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.double_shots: Double your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.main_attack}} arrows, but they deal f{-30%} damage per arrow.//8{(This makes it harder to hit far enemies)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.power_shots: Your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.main_attack}} arrows have increased speed and knockback.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_storm: Shoot two stream of f{8} arrows, dealing significant damage to close mobs and pushing them back.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_escape_i: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.escape}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_shield: Create a shield around you that deal damage and knock back mobs when triggered. (2 Charges)
wynnlib.ability.desc.windy_feet: When casting n{@{.escape}}, give speed to yourself and nearby allies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_air_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Air attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_thunder_mast: Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_fire_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_earth_master: Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_water_master: Increase your base damage from all Water attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_rain: When n{@{.arrow_shield}} loses its last charge, unleash f{200} arrows raining down on enemies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.nimble_string: n{@{.arrow_storm}} throw out f{+8} arrows per stream and shoot twice as fast.
wynnlib.ability.desc.phantom_ray: Condense n{@{.arrow_storm}} into a single ray that damages enemies f{10} times per second.
wynnlib.ability.desc.fire_creep: n{@{.arrow_bomb}} will leak a trail of fire for f{6s}, damaging enemies that walk into it every f{0.4s}
wynnlib.ability.desc.bryophyte_roots: When you hit an enemy with n{@{.arrow_storm}}, create an area that slows them down and deals damage every f{0.4s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.triple_shots: Triple your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.main_attack}} arrows, but they deal f{-20%} damage per arrow.
wynnlib.ability.desc.frenzy: Every time you hit an enemy briefly gain f{+6%} Walk Speed. (Max 200%)//Decay f{-40%} of the bonus every second.
wynnlib.ability.desc.guardian_angels: Your protective arrows from n{@{.arrow_shield}} will become sentient bows dealing damage up to f{8} times each to nearby enemies.//8{(@{.arrow_shield} will no longer push nearby enemies)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.focus: When hitting an aggressive enemy f{5+} blocks away, gain b{+1 @{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}}. (Max 3)//Resets if you miss once.
wynnlib.ability.desc.basaltic_trap: When you hit the ground with n{@{.arrow_bomb}}, leave a b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_trap}} that damages enemies. (Max 2 Traps)
wynnlib.ability.desc.windstorm: n{@{.arrow_storm}} shoot f{+1 stream} of arrows, effectively doubling its damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_storm: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.arrow_storm}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.grappling_hook: When casting n{@{.escape}}, throw a hook that pulls you when hitting a block. If you hit an enemy, pull them towards you instead.//8{(@{.escape} will not throw you backward anymore)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.implosion: n{@{.arrow_bomb}} will pull enemies towards you. If a b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_trap}} is nearby, it will pull them towards it instead.//Increase n{@{.heart_shatter}}'s damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.patient_hunter: Your b{Traps} will deal f{+20%} more damage for every second they are active. (Max +80%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.stormy_feet: n{@{.windy_feet}} will last longer and add more speed.
wynnlib.ability.desc.traveler: For every f{1%} Walk Speed you have from items, gain f{+1 Raw} Spell Damage. (Max 100)
wynnlib.ability.desc.twains_arc: If you have b{2+ @{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}}, holding shift will summon the Twain's Arc. Charge it up to shoot a destructive long-range beam.//8{(Damage is dealt as n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.main_attack}} Damage)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.bouncing_bomb: n{@{.arrow_bomb}} will bounce once when hitting a block or enemy.
wynnlib.ability.desc.fierce_stomp: When using n{@{.escape}}, hold shift to quickly drop down and deal damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_traps: Increase the maximum amount of active b{Traps} you can have by f{+2}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.leap: When you double tap jump, leap forward. (2s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.homing_shots: Your n{@{wynnlib.gameplay.main_attack}} arrows will follow nearby enemies and not be affected by gravity.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shocking_bomb: n{@{.arrow_bomb}} will not be affected by gravity, and all damage conversions become e{✦} Thunder.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_arrow_shield: n{@{.arrow_shield}} will gain additional area of effect, knockback and damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mana_trap: Your b{Traps} will give you f{2.85} Mana per second when you stay close to them.
wynnlib.ability.desc.escape_artist: When casting n{@{.escape}}, release f{120} arrows towards the ground.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_guardian_ang: Your n{@{.guardian_angels}} can shoot f{+4} arrows before disappearing.
wynnlib.ability.desc.initiator: If you do not damage an enemy for f{5s} or more, your next successful hit will deal f{+50%} damage and add b{+1 @{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_storm: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.arrow_storm}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.call_of_the_hound: n{@{.arrow_shield}} summon a b{Hound} that will attack and drag aggressive enemies towards your traps.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_hurricane: n{@{.arrow_storm}} will shoot f{+2} stream of arrows.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_shiel: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.arrow_shield}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.rocket_jump: n{@{.arrow_bomb}}'s self-damage will knockback you farther away.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shrapnel_bomb: n{@{.arrow_bomb}}'s explosion will fling f{15} shrapnel, dealing damage in a large area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.decimator: n{@{.phantom_ray}} will be increase its damage by f{10%} everytime you do not miss with it. (Max 50%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_escape_ii: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.escape}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_hook: Increases your n{@{.grappling_hook}}'s range, speed and strength.
wynnlib.ability.desc.geyser_stomp: n{@{.fierce_stomp}} will create geysers, dealing more damage and vertical knockback.
wynnlib.ability.desc.crepuscular_ray: If you have b{5 @{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}}, casting n{@{.arrow_storm}} will make you levitate and shoot f{20} homing arrows per second until you run out of b{@{wynnlib.gameplay.archer_focus}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.grape_bomb: n{@{.arrow_bomb}} will throw f{3} additional smaller bombs when exploding.
wynnlib.ability.desc.elusive: If you do not get hit for f{8+} seconds, become immune to self-damage and remove n{@{.arrow_storm}}'s recoil.//8{(Dodging counts as not getting hit)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.tangled_traps: Your b{Traps} will be connected by a rope that deals damage to enemies every f{0.2s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_patient_hu: Add f{+80%} Max Damage to n{@{.patient_hunter}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.snow_storm: Enemies near you will be slowed down.
wynnlib.ability.desc.all_seeing_panoptes: Your bows from n{@{.guardian_angels}} become all-seeing, increasing their range, damage and letting them shoot up to f{+5} times each.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_bomb_: Reduce the Mana cost of n{@{.arrow_bomb}}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.minefield: Allow you to place b{+6 Traps}, but with reduced damage and range.
